input.sentences: here we are lining up for the fun run .
on you mark | get set go !
running in this costume is not so easy | but i see the finish line
the people cheering as we finish the run .
afterwards | we had fun on the giant slide
output.sentences: The townspeople gather at the starting line to compete in the annual austism walk.
In the meantime the town's mascot Rodney the Bull approaches the starting line and chants the magic words for the participants to begin
Eager to run, the children take off leaving their parents behind.
Some children even decided to convince their parents to dress up as superheros with them to make the race more fun.
At the end of the race, the children will have to slide down a bounce house.
